locations.name: Amsterdam
locations.description: The vibrant starting point of the cruise, famous for its picturesque canals and world-class museums. Travelers embark here.

locations.name: Cologne
locations.description: A major docking city on the Rhine, renowned for its impressive Gothic Cathedral.

locations.name: Strasbourg
locations.description: The capital of Alsace, where the cruise docks, known for its fairytale Petite France district and unique Franco-Germanic culture.

locations.name: Basel
locations.description: The concluding city of the cruise journey, located in Switzerland near the borders of France and Germany.
